messages.message:
i ran `rm -rf node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn install` and retried. this works sometimes, but sometimes compilation and restarting still fails, and then i have to run this again...
also i still get the `Uncaught Error: Cannot find module 'codemirror/lib/codemirror.css'` error when opening a build project :confused:
@Vishnu can you send me a link to your sandbox? I can try to take a look today
yes http://ppy-server-nginx--vishnuchopra-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/ sandbox name is `vishnuchopra` in case you want to ssh into it. thank you!!

@Vishnu I'm not familiar with using ppy to run the sandbox, only the typical frontend dev setup - but I did check out your node_modules and codemirror wasn't in there. I removed the node_modules again and reran yarn install and now it's there. Just to double check, you were doing it in webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked?
